thread.title_full: Shruti resumes Katamarayudu after holidaying with boyfriend Michael Corsale : Celebrities, News - India Today

title: Shruti resumes Katamarayudu after holidaying with boyfriend Michael Corsale : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
Shruti resumes Katamarayudu after holidaying with boyfriend Michael Corsale Diva Shruti Haasan has resumed shooting for powerstar Pawan Kalyan's upcoming entertainer Katamarayudu. IndiaToday.in | Written by Srivatsan A + A - Shruti Haasan 
Actor Shruti Haasan was snapped with her rumoured boyfriend Michael Corsale, who hails from London. While the identity of the man is kept under the wraps, Shruti is said to be dating Michael for quite sometime. Recently, the actor was spotted with her mystery man in Mumbai airport. 
Shruti, who is believed to have spent her vacation with Michale, has finally resumed shooting for Katamarayudu, which has powerstar Pawan Kalyan in the lead. 
Taking it to Twitter, Shruti said, "Hello Hyderabad!! Back for the shoot of katamaraydu and looking forward to some super duper work today!" Hello Hyderabad !! Back for the shoot of katamaraydu and looking forward to some super duper work today ! â€” shruti haasan (@shrutihaasan) February 21, 2017 Shruti also shared a recent picture of her on her Instagram account. A post shared by @shrutzhaasan on Feb 21, 2017 at 5:18am PST 

Katamarayudu marks her reunion with Pawan Kalyan after five years. The duo had previously worked together in 2012 Telugu actioner Gabbar Singh. 
Pawan Kalyan, who was in the US to deliver a key speech at India Conference 2017, is expected to join the sets. 
Directed by Dolly, the film also stars Siva Balaji, Ajay, Kamal Kamaraju and Chaitanya Krishna in important roles. 
A remake of Tamil blockbuster Veeram, the principal shooting of Katamaryudu is expected to be wrapped by this month end. 
Produced by North Star Entertainment, the film is gearing up for March 29 release.
